subject: Finally uploaded a file!
author: Jill
full_text:
So I finally got some motivation and figured out how to get a file from my cassette tape to the computer.  It's in the "Files" area here (hopefully I did everything correctly and according to protocol):

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jill%27s%20Ghost%20Box%20Files/

I cleaned it up somewhat in Audacity, taking out all the extra radio snippets, so what's left is me asking for someone to say my niece's name, and then the four "Katies" that came after that.  There's even, I think, a fifth Katie tucked in there while I'm asking, as well as the obligatory "I love you" first thing after I've finished asking.  

Some background:  Got my niece and cousin to do a session with me today.  Cousin has been dragging her feet, is skeptical, and the niece just arrived from out of town, is more openminded.  I'm pleased we got someone to say her name four times in a row, and I'm uploading it here so she can hear it back home.  So this isn't the best file I have.  Maybe now that I know how to upload (if it worked), I can upload some of my better session happenings!
